steps.description: User initiates Clubcard registration via web or mobile app, provides email/phone, and accepts T&Cs. Business events: clubcard_signup_started, clubcard_signup_submitted with user_id and source attributes.
steps.businessRationale: Sign-up is a short form flow; low friction increases activation and expands the Clubcard base which drives personalization and future revenue uplift.

steps.description: System sends verification code via email/SMS and user confirms account. Business events: verification_sent, verification_completed, verification_failed with channel and latency metrics.
steps.businessRationale: Fast verification reduces drop-off; delays or failed messages reduce activation rate and delay points earning and personalization.

steps.description: User links physical Clubcard or virtual card to account, or imports existing Clubcard number. Business events: clubcard_link_requested, clubcard_linked, clubcard_link_failed with clubcard_id and user_id.
steps.businessRationale: Linking enables immediate points attribution and personalized offers; friction here reduces ability to attribute purchases and lowers campaign ROI.

steps.description: Customer makes qualifying purchases; transaction is matched to Clubcard and points are calculated and posted. Business events: purchase_matched_to_clubcard, points_calculated, points_posted with order_id, SKU list (e.g., TESCO_1L_MILK, TESCO_500G_PASTA), and points_value.
steps.businessRationale: Points posting involves real-time and batch processes (transaction matching, fraud checks, ledger update). Timely points visibility increases perceived value and encourages repeat purchases.

steps.description: User views available rewards, redeems vouchers or applies points at checkout. Business events: reward_viewed, reward_redeemed, voucher_issued, voucher_applied with reward_id and monetary_value (e.g., TESCO_Â£5_VOUCHER).
steps.businessRationale: Redemption is a direct monetization touchpoint; smooth redemption increases perceived loyalty value and can drive incremental spend when vouchers are used.

steps.description: Personalization engine generates targeted offers based on Clubcard history; offers are delivered via app push, email, or on-site banners. Business events: offer_generated, offer_sent, offer_clicked, offer_redeemed with campaign_id and expected_uplift.
steps.businessRationale: Personalization pipelines include model scoring and campaign delivery; timely, relevant offers increase conversion and AOV. Latency in offer delivery reduces campaign effectiveness.
